msg: JIRA Issue #1494: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1494. Adding isConstant() and constant() methods to ItemPSVI to make it easier for users to persist PSVI information that they receive from a PSVIProvider or PSVI annotated DOM.
